means: 为…钉蹄铁( shoe的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: I wear my old shoes every day. One sole has come unglued.
sentence.Network_cn: 我每天都穿那双旧鞋，有一只鞋底已经脱胶了。

sentence.Network_en: Dorothy, come on. Never mind your shoes. They'll soon dry off.
sentence.Network_cn: 快点儿吧，多萝西。别去管你的鞋子了，它们很快就会干的。

sentence.Network_en: Marla was recently seen slinging her shoes at Trump.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近有人看见马拉朝特朗普扔鞋子。

entry.def: Shoes are objects which you wear on your feet. They cover most of your foot and you wear them over socks or stockings.

example.tran: 舒服的低跟鞋子最好了。

entry.def: A shoe is the same as a horseshoe .
When a blacksmith shoes a horse, they fix horseshoes onto its feet.

example.ex: Blacksmiths spent most of their time repairing tools and shoeing horses...
example.tran: 铁匠大部分时间都在修理工具和钉马掌。

example.ex: He helped his father by holding the horses steady while they were being shod.
example.tran: 他父亲给马钉掌时他就帮忙将马抓牢。

entry.def: If you fill someone's shoes or step into their shoes, you take their place by doing the job they were doing.

example.ex: No one has been able to fill his shoes...
example.tran: 目前还没人能接替他的位置。

example.ex: Now that Chris is gone she wants me to step into his shoes.
example.tran: 既然克里斯走了，她就想让我接替他的位置。

entry.def: If you talk about being in someone's shoes, you talk about what you would do or how you would feel if you were in their situation.

example.ex: I wouldn't want to be in his shoes.
example.tran: 我可不想处在他那样的处境。

sentences.sentence: "If you were in my place what would you do?"

auth_sentence.content: Your brother's going to put on his shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your brother's going to put on his shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your brother's going to put on his shoes.

auth_sentence.content: Try to place yourself in this person's shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Try to place yourself in this person's shoes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Try to place yourself in this person's shoes.

auth_sentence.content: Maybe they could ask how many shoes you own?
auth_sentence.res_content: Maybe they could ask how many shoes you own?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Maybe they could ask how many shoes you own?

Sentence.sentence: Buy their own shoes and socks.
Thus, wearing the right brand of clothes or shoes may be of the utmost importance.

sentences.en: Jack's shoes were caked with mud in a country road after a shower.
sentences.cn: 阵雨过后走在乡村小路上，杰克的鞋子上沾了些泥块。
